## Container.unique() method

Returns unique elements of an array item

Signature:

```typescript
unique(key: string): any;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description |
| --------- | ------ | ----------- |
| key       | string |             |

Returns:

any

## Example

```js
container.unique("item");
```
